page.title: 15Our local Vicar.
page.content: Our Vicar wears his collar and his black shirt back to front.He wears a grey and navy blue checked jacket and black trousers and he wears black shoes as well.For a church service the vicar wears a black Cassock which is like a cloak that comes down to his ankles,a white Surplice wich is like a half cloak,a green scarf and a long wide black hood.The vicar goes to funerals and weddings and he goes to see babies and other people in hospital and he goes to childrens homes and handicapped people.Once he accompanied a blind man to Canada and back.When he left shcool he had to join the army for two years.Then he left the army and went to Cambridge University and decided to be a vicar.
